name: Create course
description:
Функция проверки.

        Проверка создания курса и отображения его в списке курсов.
descriptionHtml:
Функция проверки.

    Проверка создания курса и отображения его в списке курсов.

steps.name: Checking that input "Email" has a value "user.name@gmail.com"
Checking that input "Username" has a value "username"
Checking that input "Password" has a value "password"

testStage.description:
Функция проверки.

        Проверка создания курса и отображения его в списке курсов.

steps.name: Check create course toolbar with button "create_course_disabled" state="True"
Checking that text "Title" have text "Create course"
Checking that button "Create course" is visible
Checking that text "Title" have text "Tap on "Upload image" button to select file"
Checking that text "Description" have text "Recommended file size 540X300"
Checking that button "Upload image" is visible
Checking that text "Title" have text "No image selected"
Checking that text "Description" have text "Preview of selected image will be displayed here"

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: 'Preview of selected image will be displayed here'

steps.name: Checking that input "Title" has a value ""
Checking that input "Estimated time" is visible
Checking that input "Estimated time" has a value ""
Checking that base element "Description" is visible
Checking that base element "Description" has a value ""
Checking that input "Max score" is visible
Checking that input "Max score" has a value "0"
Checking that input "Min score" is visible
Checking that input "Min score" has a value "0"
Check visible create course exercises toolbar
Checking that button "Create exercise" is visible
Checking that text "Title" have text "There is no exercises"
Checking that text "Description" have text "Click on "Create exercise" button to create new exercise"

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: 'Click on "Create exercise" button to create new exercise'

steps.name: Set file "testdata/files/image.png" to the file input "File input"
Checking that text "Title" have text "Tap on "Upload image" button to select file"
Checking that text "Description" have text "Recommended file size 540X300"
Checking that button "Upload image" is visible
Checking that button "Remove image" is visible
Checking that input "Title" has a value "Playwright"
Fill input "Estimated time" to value "2 weeks"
Checking that input "Estimated time" has a value "2 weeks"
Checking that base element "Description" has a value "Playwright"
Checking that input "Max score" has a value "100"
Checking that input "Min score" has a value "10"
Checking that button "Create course" is visible
Check visible course view at index "0"
Checking that text "Max score" is visible
Checking that text "Max score" have text "Max score: 100"
Checking that text "Min score" is visible
Checking that text "Min score" have text "Min score: 10"
Checking that text "Estimated time" is visible
Checking that text "Estimated time" have text "Estimated time: 2 weeks"
